title: My university challenge
creator_credit: Ray Martin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Ray Martin and his girlfriend enrolled in a university course in Thailand to become qualified English teachers. It was here that Martin set himself a challenge that not many people had been successful at achieving.
